channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: On junction of All Saints Rd and All Saints Villas Road the pavement, kerb line and road is in a bad state., 19th February
item.description:
Wet leaves and mud have been there for months, it’s slippery, dirty and dangerous.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): All Saints Villas Road, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Near junction of All Saints Road and Hewlett Rd is a wet pile of loose cardboard, 19th February
item.description:
It’s on the pavement and it’s been there for months.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, All Saints' Road, Fairview, Cheltenham

item.title: Road is disintegrating, 19th February
item.description:
The road (Blacksmith`s Lane) between Bishops Cottage and Holborn Farm, The Leigh is disintegrating. Large potholes quickly keep reappearing even after being filled in. It is becoming impossible to drive on. This section of road needs resurfacing.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Blacksmith Lane, Leigh, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked drain causing flooding twice of 2 garages, 19th February
item.description:
Drain in shared driveway at numbers 19 and 21 Handley Place. GL3 4ZD. Caused by mud and debris from children’s play area which is at higher ground. Have previously paid commercial company to clear drains, but issue still stands.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hurricane Road, Brockworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
